title: Sports and Hobbies 1
sentences: My favorite sport is soccer and I play every Sunday.
Do you want to play basketball in the park this afternoon?
nueva para el partido de tenis.
I need a new racket for the tennis match.
se ha quedado en el tejado del vecino.
The ball stayed (got stuck) on the neighbor's roof.
My team always wins the important matches.
It is very difficult to win against that professional player.
Nobody likes to lose a championship final.
Tomorrow we have a match against the neighboring school.
I practice swimming at the municipal pool.
I prefer to swim in the pool because the sea is cold.
por la mañana cuando hace fresco.
I like to run in the morning when it's cool.
tres veces por semana en el gimnasio.
They train three times a week at the gym.
es un deporte muy popular en España.
Cycling is a very popular sport in Spain.
Do you know how to play chess or do you prefer cards?
está lleno de gente animando al equipo.
The stadium is full of people cheering for the team.
I bought a very light mountain bike.
Juan is the captain of the volleyball team.
We won a silver medal in the competition.
es muy estricto pero muy bueno.
Our coach is very strict but very good.
I practice yoga to relax after work.
The children are playing volleyball in the sand.
es la mejor forma de ver la naturaleza.
Hiking is the best way to see nature.
I need some new sneakers (sports shoes).
The referee whistled the end of the match.
We are going to the gym to lift weights.
